授業目的: This course introduces students to various social and cultural topics of contemporary China in relation to the domestic and global contexts.
到達目標: Students will gain a general understanding of social and cultural trends in contemporary China in relation to the country's domestic situation and prevailing international conditions.

トピック.授業計画1: Topics relating to China will be chosen to reflect student interests as well as current scholarly discussions.
トピック.授業外学習2: Weekly readings, essay topics, and presentation prompts will be announced in class.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: 授業外学修課題／Assignment, homework required outside class (06)
成績評価Grading2: プレゼンテーション・発表／Presentation (07)
成績評価Grading3: 授業への参加度（自発性、積極性、主体性、等）／In-class participation,contribution (09)
